parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of relationship paths. Allows the client to customize which related resources should be returned.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An array of filters (e.g. `filter[keyA]=<value>&filter[keyB]=<value1>,<value2>...`). Allows the client to request for specific filtering criteria to be applied to the request. Semantics of each set of filter key/values and of the set of filters as a whole depend on the specific request. Available filters: `name`, `description`, `status`.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list that refers to the name(s) of the fields to be returned. An empty value indicates that all fields will be returned (less any fields specified as `omitFields`).

parameters.name: omitFields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list that refers to the name(s) of fields to be omitted from the results. This could be useful as a shortcut when a specific field such as large geometry fields should be omitted, but it is not practical or not desirable to explicitly whitelist fields individually. An empty value indicates that no fields will be omitted (although they may still not be present in the result if an explicit choice of fields was provided via `fields`).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields of the primary data according to which the results should be sorted. Sort order is ascending unless the field name is prefixed with a minus (for descending order).

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size for pagination. If not supplied, pagination with default page size of 25 elements will be applied.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. If not supplied, the first page of results will be returned.

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: If set to `true`, pagination will be disabled. This overrides any other pagination query parameters, if supplied.

400.description: Bad Request. Incorrect or missing parameters

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of relationship paths. Allows the client to customize which related resources should be returned.

parameters.name: filter
parameters.description: An array of filters (e.g. `filter[keyA]=<value>&filter[keyB]=<value1>,<value2>...`). Allows the client to request for specific filtering criteria to be applied to the request. Semantics of each set of filter key/values and of the set of filters as a whole depend on the specific request. Available filters: `name`, `description`, `status`.

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list that refers to the name(s) of the fields to be returned. An empty value indicates that all fields will be returned (less any fields specified as `omitFields`).

parameters.name: omitFields
parameters.description: A comma-separated list that refers to the name(s) of fields to be omitted from the results. This could be useful as a shortcut when a specific field such as large geometry fields should be omitted, but it is not practical or not desirable to explicitly whitelist fields individually. An empty value indicates that no fields will be omitted (although they may still not be present in the result if an explicit choice of fields was provided via `fields`).

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of fields of the primary data according to which the results should be sorted. Sort order is ascending unless the field name is prefixed with a minus (for descending order).

parameters.name: page[size]
parameters.description: Page size for pagination. If not supplied, pagination with default page size of 25 elements will be applied.

parameters.name: page[number]
parameters.description: Page number for pagination. If not supplied, the first page of results will be returned.

parameters.name: disablePagination
parameters.description: If set to `true`, pagination will be disabled. This overrides any other pagination query parameters, if supplied.

get.description: Get a calculated H3 impact map given an Indicator, Year and Resolution comparing the actual data against the given Scenario.  The resulting map will contain the difference between the actual data and the given scenario data plus actual data

parameters.name: locationTypes[]
parameters.description: Types of Sourcing Locations, written with hyphens

parameters.name: comparedScenarioId
parameters.description: The id of the scenario against which the actual data will be compared to.

parameters.name: relative
parameters.description: Indicates whether the result will be absolute difference values (false) or relative values in percentages (true)

400.description: Bad Request. Incorrect or missing parameters

get.description: Get a calculated H3 impact map given an Indicator, Year and Resolution comparing the given Scenario against another Scenario. The resulting map will contain the difference between actual data and the given base scenario data, minus the actual data and the compared Scenario.

parameters.name: locationTypes[]
parameters.description: Types of Sourcing Locations, written with hyphens

parameters.name: baseScenarioId
parameters.description: The of the scenario that will be the base for the comparison.

parameters.name: comparedScenarioId
parameters.description: The id of the scenario against which the base Scenario will be compared to.

parameters.name: relative
parameters.description: Indicates whether the result will be absolute difference values (false) or relative values in percentages (true)

info.title: LandGriffon API
info.description: LandGriffon is a conservation planning platform.

isPublic.description: Make a Scenario public to all users

description.example: This intervention will replace cotton for wool

enum: Source from new supplier or location

percentage.description: Percentage of the chosen sourcing records affected by intervention

scenarioId.description: Id of Scenario the intervention belongs to

materialIds.description: Ids of Materials that will be affected by intervention

businessUnitIds.description: Ids of Business Units that will be affected by intervention

t1SupplierIds.description: Ids of T1 Suppliers that will be affected by intervention

producerIds.description: Ids of Producers that will be affected by intervention

adminRegionIds.description: Ids of Admin Regions that will be affected by intervention

newLocationType.description: Type of new Supplier Location, is required for Intervention types: Switch to a new material and Source from new supplier or location

newLocationCountryInput.description: New Supplier Location country, is required for Intervention types: Switch to a new material, Source from new supplier or location

newLocationAdminRegionInput.description:
New Administrative Region, is required for Intervention types: Switch to a new material, Source from new supplier or location
    for Location Type: administrative-region-of-production

newLocationAddressInput.description:
New Supplier Location address, is required for Intervention types: Switch to a new material, Source from new supplier or location
    and New Supplier Locations of types: point-of-production and production-aggregation-point in case no coordintaes were provided.
    Address OR coordinates must be provided.

    Must be NULL for New Supplier Locations of types: unknown and country-of-production
    or if coordinates are provided for the relevant location types

newLocationLatitude.description:
New Supplier Location latitude, is required for Intervention types: Switch to a new material, Source from new supplier or location
    and New Supplier Locations of types: point-of-production and production-aggregation-point in case no address was provided.
    Address OR coordinates must be provided.

    Must be NULL for New Supplier Locations of types: unknown and country-of-production
    or if address is provided for the relevant location types.

newLocationLongitude.description:
New Supplier Location longitude, is required for Intervention types: Switch to a new material, Source from new supplier or location
    and New Supplier Locations of types: point-of-production and production-aggregation-point in case no address was provided.
    Address OR coordinates must be provided.

    Must be NULL for New Supplier Locations of type: unknown and country-of-production
    or if address is provided for the relevant location types.

newMaterialId.description: Id of the New Material, is required if Intervention type is Switch to a new material

description.example: This intervention will replace cotton for wool

enum: Source from new supplier or location

percentage.description: Percentage of the chosen sourcing records affected by intervention

scenarioId.description: Id of Scenario the intervention belongs to

materialIds.description: Ids of Materials that will be affected by intervention

businessUnitIds.description: Ids of Business Units that will be affected by intervention

t1SupplierIds.description: Ids of T1 Suppliers that will be affected by intervention

producerIds.description: Ids of Producers that will be affected by intervention

adminRegionIds.description: Ids of Admin Regions that will be affected by intervention
